node.title: Helping Hypertension, Healing Communities
node.description: High blood pressure: as many as three-quarters of us will have to contend with the diagnosis sooner or later.  Yet the steady march of this silent killer provides unique evangelism opportunities.  In this seminar, Dr. DeRose provides insights from his new book, 30 Days to Natural Blood Pressure Control,  offering cutting-edge natural remedies along with a simple, inexpensive plan to help your community address high blood pressure— and get better acquainted with our Savior.
